mapper.select: SELECT @a:=@a+1 serial_number ,substr(a.regdate,1,19) regd ,a.regdate ,a.gps_type ,a.source ,a.location ,a.latitude ,a.longitude ,a.gps_id FROM gps a, (SELECT @a:= 0) AS sn WHERE a.case_id = #{case_id} ORDER BY regdate desc
SELECT latitude ,longitude FROM gps WHERE DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') = substr(#{regdate},1,10) AND case_id = #{case_id} ORDER BY regdate asc
